title: Pilaster And Dado Border, "Decor Chasse et Peche", 1859–65
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Neo-Renaissance pilaster of brown carved wood edged with bands of deep blue. Applied to capital is grisaille bust of huntsman in feathered cap. In front of niche near base of pilaster, and supported by a gold console, stands a woman in grisaille bearing aloft a string of fish and having shellfish at her feet. Printed on reverse: "Peche Dore 3158".

tombstone.epitaph:
Pilaster And Dado Border, "Decor Chasse et Peche", 1859–65.
1859–65. Block-printed. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1955-12-11.
